title: Godfather Cocktail
full_text:
Godfather Cocktail
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
Scotch
or bourbon
1/2
ounce
amaretto
Directions
Fill a glass about two thirds full of ice. Add whiskey and amaretto. Stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into ice-filled rocks glass. Serve.
Serious Eats / Liz Clayman
Special Equipment
Rocks glass
, mixing glass,
strainer
,
mixing spoon
,
jigger
Whiskey
Father's Day
